tasks.build: deno task tsc && deno task rollup && deno --allow-env --allow-read --allow-run esbuild.mjs && deno task clean-dts
tasks.test: deno task build && deno run --allow-run --allow-net --allow-read tests/run-tests.ts
tasks.clean-dts: find dist -name "*.d.ts" ! -name "index.d.ts" -type f -delete && find dist -type d -delete
